Wind Style: Great Breach |viz manga=Wind Style: Devastation |parent jutsu=Wind Release: Breakthrough |jutsu rank=C |jutsu classification=Ninjutsu |jutsu type=Wind Release |jutsu class type=Offensive |jutsu range=Short, Mid |users=Gaara, Kokage Yanagikage, Orochimaru, Bandō~anime, Jakō Ryūdōin~game, Kakashi Hatake~game |hand signs=Tiger, Ox, Dog, Rabbit, Snake |debut manga=46 |boruto=No |sasuke retsuden=No |konoha shinden=No |blue vortex=No |debut anime=28 |debut shippuden=No |boruto anime=No |game debut=Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 2 |jutsu media=Anime, Manga, Game }} The user breathes [[wind]] from their mouth, blowing away whatever is in front of them. The technique itself is quite simple, but its power varies significantly depending on the user's skill and how strong they make the winds; ''[[Rin no Sho]]'' compares [[Orochimaru]]'s use of this technique against [[Team Kakashi|Team 7]] to a hurricane, as his is able to uproot trees. == Trivia == * When used by Orochimaru in [[That Goal is…!!|''Naruto'' chapter 48]], his use of this technique resembles other manga depictions of fire; it was not confirmed as this technique until the release of ''Rin no Sho''.
